{{Rescuee Infobox
|image = SxAgentBaxter.png
|name = Agent Baxter
|status = Alive
|job = ICE Agent
|workplace = Immigration and Customs Enforcement
|only appearance = [[No Days Off]]
|seasons = '''[[Station |S]]:''' [[Season  (Station )|]]
|portrayed by = [[Mac Brandt]]
}}

'''Agent Baxter''' is one of the two ICE agents who arrived to take [[Beto]].


Baxter and his partner Prine came to a restaurant after the owner, [[Dominic]], called and asked them to come pick up one of his employees, [[Beto]], whom he knew to be undocumented. Shortly after they arrived, Sullivan came into the kitchen and said because there'd been a grease fire in the kitchen, it was his scene and said that all the kitchen employees, particularly Beto, who pretended to have a serious burn on his arm, were his patients. He then calmly explained out loud that the law prohibited them from asking for documentation without just cause and also prohibited them from chasing anyone who decided to run from the scene, prompting the rest of the kitchen staff to run out quickly. Prine tried to chase them, but Sullivan stopped them, claiming he just slipped on the floor.

They convinced Prine and Baxter to let them wait for an ambulance to avoid the bad PR that could come from denying him medical care. When the PRT arrived, Prine wanted to ride with them, but Jackson said Beto wouldn't talk to them without a lawyer present, so there was no point. Prine and Baxter were instead told they could meet him at the hospital. On their way to the hospital, Jackson and Ben decided to create an opening for Beto to escape.


He is an agent with Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

'''Agent Prine''' is one of the two ICE agents who arrived to take [[Beto]].


Prine and his partner Baxter came to a restaurant after the owner, [[Dominic]], called and asked them to come pick up one of his employees, [[Beto]], whom he knew to be undocumented. Shortly after they arrived, Sullivan came into the kitchen and said because there'd been a grease fire in the kitchen, it was his scene and said that all the kitchen employees, particularly Beto, who pretended to have a serious burn on his arm, were his patients. He then calmly explained out loud that the law prohibited them from asking for documentation without just cause and also prohibited them from chasing anyone who decided to run from the scene, prompting the rest of the kitchen staff to run out quickly. Prine tried to chase them, but Sullivan stopped them, claiming he just slipped on the floor.

They convinced Prine and Baxter to let them wait for an ambulance to avoid the bad PR that could come from denying him medical care. When the PRT arrived, Prine wanted to ride with them, but Jackson said Beto wouldn't talk to them without a lawyer present, so there was no point. Prine and Baxter were instead told they could meet him at the hospital. On their way to the hospital, Jackson and Ben decided to create an opening for Beto to escape.


He is an agent with Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

|image = SxBeto.png
|name = Beto
|status = Alive
|marital = Wife
|children = Two daughters
|job = Line Cook
|workplace = Domenico's
|only appearance = [[No Days Off]]
|seasons = '''[[Station |S]]:''' [[Season  (Station )|]]
|portrayed by = [[Jorge-Luis Pallo]]
}}

'''Beto''' is a kitchen employee whose boss called ICE on him.


Beto was working in a kitchen with [[Dominic]] when Dominic became angry because Beto was distracted by getting garlic and burned a steak. Dominic then called ICE and reported him. Sullivan, who had stepped into the kitchen to put out a grease fire, told him to call them back and tell them not to come as they could also fine him for employing people he knew to be undocumented. In addition to that, Sullivan threatened him with fire violations. Dominic quickly called them back.

Despite this call, [[Agent Prine]] and [[Agent Baxter]] arrived shortly afterward and entered the kitchen to take Beto. Sullivan and Andy followed them into the kitchen and Sullivan quickly stood up to them and protected the kitchen staff, informing them of their rights and claiming the scene as his due to the grease fire. Beto pretended to have a severe burn on his arm so they could treat him instead of letting ICE take him. Once Ben arrived with the PRT, Beto went with them.

On the way to the hospital, he told Jackson and Ben that he wasn't a criminal. He had to flee his home country with his wife and children to save their lives and he works very hard. Jackson and Ben decided to go in through the parking structure instead of the ambulance bay, allowing Beto to escape unnoticed.



He is married.


He and his wife have two daughters. The younger daughter is eleven.


He is a line cook at Domenico's. He says that he was a teacher in his home country before the war.

{{Rescuee Infobox
|image = SxDominic.png
|name = Dominic
|status = Alive
|job = Chef/Owner
|workplace = Domenico's
|only appearance = [[No Days Off]]
|seasons = '''[[Station |S]]:''' [[Season  (Station )|]]
|portrayed by = [[Shane Blades]]
}}

'''Dominic''' is the owner of a restaurant who employed undocumented immigrants.


Dominic became angry with [[Beto]], one of his employees, when Beto became distracted and burned a steak and called ICE to pick up him, knowing he was undocumented. Sullivan overheard this call and convinced Dominic to call them back, saying he'd get in trouble for employing undocumented workers and also pointing out some fire violations in his kitchen. Dominic called them back, but two agents still came. They quickly ordered him out of the kitchen, saying they'd have to decide whether or not to charge him.


He owns and is the chef at Domenico's. 


*His restaurant is located at  Sumpter Garden Square.
